title: r/Maliciouscompliance Employer: "I'm Paying You Less" Worker: "OK, I'll Work Less"
description: r/Maliciouscompliance In today's episode, OP boss quits, so he thinks that he's up for a new promotion and starts picking up the slack left by his absent boss. He waits, and he waits, but the promotion still hasn't come. When he asks the company owner about it, the owner says that OP isn't qualified for a promotion, but he should still keep doing the boss's work... just without the boss's pay. Yeah, fat chance! Less pay equals less work!
